Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class MovementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.MovementFactory
  • public class MovementFactory
extends Object
    Factory to store movement point spec's and construct movement objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MovementFactory​(HexMap map, int cruiseMovementPoints)
      Create a movement factory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Cruise createCruise()
      Create a cruising movement, all movements allowed.
      Flank createFlank()
      Create a flanking movement.
      Halt createHalt()
      Create a halting movement, no movement allowed.
      void damageMobility()
      Apply damage to the movement factory, reducing the total movement points.
      void destroyMobility()
      Destroy the movement factory, reducing movement points to zero.
      int getCruiseMovementPoints()
      Get number of cruising movement points.
      int getFlankMovementPoints()
      Get number of flanking movement points.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovementFactory

        public MovementFactory​(HexMap map,
                       int cruiseMovementPoints)
        Create a movement factory.
        Parameters:
        map - the map that movement objects will be created for
        cruiseMovementPoints - movement points when cruising

    • Method Detail

      • getCruiseMovementPoints

        public int getCruiseMovementPoints()
        Get number of cruising movement points.
        Returns:
        cruising movement points

      • getFlankMovementPoints

        public int getFlankMovementPoints()
        Get number of flanking movement points.
        Returns:

      • createHalt

        public Halt createHalt()
        Create a halting movement, no movement allowed.
        Returns:
        the new movement object

      • createCruise

        public Cruise createCruise()
        Create a cruising movement, all movements allowed.
        Returns:
        the new movement object

      • createFlank

        public Flank createFlank()
        Create a flanking movement. This is the fastest movement, but backwards movement is not allowed.
        Returns:
        the new movement object

      • damageMobility

        public void damageMobility()
        Apply damage to the movement factory, reducing the total movement points.

      • destroyMobility

        public void destroyMobility()
        Destroy the movement factory, reducing movement points to zero.
